text: <a href="../1-Corinthians-3-1/" title="1 Corinthians 3:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 And I, brethren, could not speak unto you as unto spiritual, but as unto carnal, *even* as unto babes in Christ.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-2/" title="1 Corinthians 3:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 I have fed you with milk, and not with meat: for hitherto ye were not able *to bear it*, neither yet now are ye able.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-3/" title="1 Corinthians 3:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 For ye are yet carnal: for whereas *there is* among you envying, and strife, and divisions, are ye not carnal, and walk as men?
<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-4/" title="1 Corinthians 3:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 For while one saith, I am of Paul; and another, I *am* of Apollos; are ye not carnal?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-5/" title="1 Corinthians 3:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Who then is Paul, and who *is* Apollos, but ministers by whom ye believed, even as the Lord gave to every man?
<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-6/" title="1 Corinthians 3:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 I have planted, Apollos watered; but God gave the increase.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-7/" title="1 Corinthians 3:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 So then neither is he that planteth any thing, neither he that watereth; but God that giveth the increase.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-8/" title="1 Corinthians 3:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 Now he that planteth and he that watereth are one: and every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labour.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-9/" title="1 Corinthians 3:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 For we are labourers together with God: ye are God's husbandry, *ye are* God's building.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-10/" title="1 Corinthians 3:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 According to the grace of God which is given unto me, as a wise masterbuilder, I have laid the foundation, and another buildeth thereon. But let every man take heed how he buildeth thereupon.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-11/" title="1 Corinthians 3:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 For other foundation can no man lay than that is laid, which is Jesus Christ.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-12/" title="1 Corinthians 3:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Now if any man build upon this foundation gold, silver, precious stones, wood, hay, stubble;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-13/" title="1 Corinthians 3:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 Every man's work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it shall be revealed by fire; and the fire shall try every man's work of what sort it is.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-14/" title="1 Corinthians 3:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 If any man's work abide which he hath built thereupon, he shall receive a reward.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-15/" title="1 Corinthians 3:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 If any man's work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss: but he himself shall be saved; yet so as by fire.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-16/" title="1 Corinthians 3:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 Know ye not that ye are the temple of God, and *that* the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-17/" title="1 Corinthians 3:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which *temple* ye are.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-18/" title="1 Corinthians 3:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 Let no man deceive himself. If any man among you seemeth to be wise in this world, let him become a fool, that he may be wise.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-19/" title="1 Corinthians 3:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written, He taketh the wise in their own craftiness.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-20/" title="1 Corinthians 3:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And again, The Lord knoweth the thoughts of the wise, that they are vain.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-21/" title="1 Corinthians 3:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are yours;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-22/" title="1 Corinthians 3:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 Whether Paul, or Apollos, or Cephas, or the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are yours;
<a href="../1-Corinthians-3-23/" title="1 Corinthians 3:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And ye are Christ's; and Christ *is* God's.
